verses.roman:
pāda-samvāhana kaila, kaṭi-pṛṣṭha cāpila
madhūra-mardane prabhura pariśrama gela

synonyms: pāda-samvāhana—massaging of the legs; kaila—he performed; kaṭi—waist; pṛṣṭha—back; cāpila—pressed; madhūra-mardane—by mild pressing; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pariśrama—fatigue; gela—went away.
translation: Govinda massaged the Lord's legs as usual. He pressed the Lord's waist and back very softly, and thus all the Lord's fatigue went away.
